mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from t_article where user_id=#{userId} and status=2

select.if: select a.* from (select t.*,u.nick_name,u.head_img from t_article t LEFT JOIN b_user u on t.user_id = u.id) a order by a.create_time desc

select a.* from (select t.*,u.nick_name,u.head_img,p.status as praiseStatus from t_article t LEFT JOIN b_user u on t.user_id = u.id left join t_article_collect_praise p on p.article_id = t.id and p.type=0 and p.user_id=#{userId} where t.user_id!=#{userId}) a order by a.create_time desc

mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,m.head_img,m.nick_name from t_article a left join b_user m on a.user_id= m.id where a.is_show=1 and a.status=2 and a.type=1 and a.user_id in (SELECT follow_id from t_user_follow where user_id=#{userId})
and a.create_time >= date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
order by a.create_time desc
limit #{limit}

select t.* from (SELECT a.*,m.head_img,m.nick_name from t_article a left join b_user m on a.user_id= m.id where a.is_show=1 and a.status=2 and a.type=1 and a.create_time >= date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
and a.user_id not in (SELECT follow_id from t_user_follow where user_id=#{userId})
order by a.praise_count desc,a.comment_count desc limit 20) t order by RAND()
limit #{limit}
